title: Hang in nn.nn.parallel.replicate
body_html:
Found this happen in pytorch master while working on #6983. Looks like it's caused by something in Broadcast. Will bisect the offending commit.

Repro:

import torch.nn as nn
import torch
import pdb

# GPUs to use
devices = [0, 1]

# toy feed-forward net
class Net(nn.Module):
    def __init__(self):
        super(Net, self).__init__()

        self.fc1 = nn.Linear(10, 5)
        self.fc2 = nn.Linear(5, 5)
        self.fc3 = nn.Linear(5, 1)

    def forward(self, x):
        x = self.fc1(x)
        x = self.fc2(x)
        x = self.fc3(x)
        return x

# define random data
pdb.set_trace()
random_input = torch.randn((4, 10))
random_target = torch.randn((4))

net = Net().cuda()

# replicate nets, scatter inputs and parallel_apply
replicas = nn.parallel.replicate(net, devices)
